C

checkAge() - Method in class jobapplication.Application
This method checks the age of the applicant.
checkAge() - Method in interface jobapplication.Eligible
This abstract method is used to check the Qualification of the applicant.
checkAvailabilityOfJob() - Method in class jobapplication.Application
This method checks the availability of the job by checking the current date with the closingDate of job.
checkAvailabilityOfJob() - Method in interface jobapplication.Available
This abstract method checks whether the job is available or not based on the closing date of the job.
checkQualification() - Method in class jobapplication.Application
This method checks the educationQualification of the applicant.
checkQualification() - Method in interface jobapplication.Eligible
This abstract method checks the age of the applicant.
CommunicationSkill - Enum in jobapplication
This ENUM contains the communication proficiency levels with a value assigned to it.
